name: Teacher of prophecy
description:
This is a very interesting simulation business game.
How can one transform from a novice chef to a top chef at a Michelin restaurant?
As a store owner, you need to entertain every customer and create delicious dishes for players based on their needs. Different customers have different taboos. Use the freshest game ingredients to ensure quality and safety issues.
Use various props and equipment to create more delicious food and receive gold coins as rewards. Even when running a restaurant alone, it is necessary to prepare ingredients in an orderly manner, receive customers, and provide the best service to entertain customers, creating delicious food full of love. Come and keep learning, grow into a top chef who is crazy about food!
